00030     // Function name   : HgeRenderer
00031     // Description     : Constructor
00033     HgeRenderer::HgeRenderer() :
00034             hge(0),
00035             m_bQueueing(true),         //Slightly modified by Owen Shelton.
00036             m_uiMaxTextureSize(1024)
00037     {
00038         // get access to the hge interface
00039         hge = HGE::hgeCreate(HGE_VERSION);
00040 
00041         // get adn the nset our display area rect with the right screen size
00042         int iScreenWidth = hge->System_GetState(HGE_SCREENWIDTH);
00043         int iScreenHeight = hge->System_GetState(HGE_SCREENHEIGHT);
00044 
00045         m_display_area.d_left   = 0;
00046         m_display_area.d_top   = 0;
00047         m_display_area.d_right   = (float)iScreenWidth;
00048         m_display_area.d_bottom   = (float)iScreenHeight;
00049 
00050         d_identifierString = "HGE Renderer";
00051     }
00052

00054     /*************************************************************************
00055     Destructor
00056     *************************************************************************/
00057     HgeRenderer::~HgeRenderer(void)
00058     {
00059         destroyAllTextures();
00060         hge->Release();
00061     }

00064     /*************************************************************************
00065     add's a quad to the list to be rendered
00066     *************************************************************************/
00067     void HgeRenderer::addQuad(const Rect& dest_rect, float z, const Texture* tex, const Rect& texture_rect, const ColourRect& colours, QuadSplitMode mode)
00068     {
00069         // if not queueing, render directly (as in, right now!)
00070         if (!m_bQueueing)
00071         {
00072             renderQuadDirect(dest_rect, z, tex, texture_rect, colours);
00073         }
00074         else
00075         {
00076             hgeQuad *quad = new hgeQuad;
00077 
00078             // the posittion and size
00079             quad->v[0].x        = dest_rect.d_left;
00080             quad->v[0].y        = dest_rect.d_top;
00081 
00082             quad->v[1].x        = dest_rect.d_right;
00083             quad->v[1].y        = dest_rect.d_top;
00084 
00085             quad->v[2].x        = dest_rect.d_right;
00086             quad->v[2].y        = dest_rect.d_bottom;
00087 
00088             quad->v[3].x        = dest_rect.d_left;
00089             quad->v[3].y        = dest_rect.d_bottom;
00090 
00091             // the z-buffer
00092             quad->v[0].z      = 0;
00093             quad->v[1].z      = 0;
00094             quad->v[2].z      = 0;
00095             quad->v[3].z      = 0;
00096 
00097             // the texture
00098             quad->tex           = ((HgeTexture*)tex)->getHgeTexture();
00099 
00100             // the texture coords
00101             quad->v[0].tx       = texture_rect.d_left;
00102             quad->v[0].ty       = texture_rect.d_top;
00103 
00104             quad->v[1].tx       = texture_rect.d_right;
00105             quad->v[1].ty       = texture_rect.d_top;
00106 
00107             quad->v[2].tx       = texture_rect.d_right;
00108             quad->v[2].ty       = texture_rect.d_bottom;
00109 
00110             quad->v[3].tx       = texture_rect.d_left;
00111             quad->v[3].ty       = texture_rect.d_bottom;
00112 
00113             // the vertex colors
00114             quad->v[0].col      = colours.d_top_left.getARGB();
00115             quad->v[1].col      = colours.d_top_right.getARGB();
00116             quad->v[2].col       = colours.d_bottom_right.getARGB();
00117             quad->v[3].col       = colours.d_bottom_left.getARGB();
00118 
00119             // blending
00120             quad->blend = BLEND_DEFAULT_Z;
00121 
00122             // insert it into the list
00123             m_quadlist.insert(quad);
00124         }
00125 
00126     }
00127 
00128 
00129     /*************************************************************************
00130     perform final rendering for all queued renderable quads.
00131     *************************************************************************/
00132     void HgeRenderer::doRender(void)
00133     {
00134         // iterate over each quad in the list
00135         for (QuadList::iterator i = m_quadlist.begin(); i != m_quadlist.end(); ++i)
00136         {
00137             hge->Gfx_RenderQuad((*i));
00138         }
00139     }
00140 
00141 
00142     /*************************************************************************
00143     clear the queue
00144     *************************************************************************/
00145     void HgeRenderer::clearRenderList(void)
00146     {
00147         while (!m_quadlist.empty())
00148         {
00149             delete (*m_quadlist.begin());
00150             m_quadlist.erase(m_quadlist.begin());
00151         }
00152     }

00155     /*************************************************************************
00156     create an empty texture
00157     *************************************************************************/
00158     Texture* HgeRenderer::createTexture(void)
00159     {
00160         HgeTexture* tex = new HgeTexture(this);
00161         m_texturelist.push_back(tex);
00162 
00163         return tex;
00164     }

00167     /*************************************************************************
00168     Create a new Texture object and load a file into it.
00169     *************************************************************************/
00170     Texture* HgeRenderer::createTexture(const String& filename, const String& resourceGroup)
00171     {
00172         HgeTexture* tex = (HgeTexture*)createTexture();
00173         tex->loadFromFile(filename, resourceGroup);
00174 
00175         return tex;
00176     }

00179     /*************************************************************************
00180     Create a new texture with the given dimensions
00181     *************************************************************************/
00182     Texture* HgeRenderer::createTexture(float size)
00183     {
00184         HgeTexture* tex = (HgeTexture*)createTexture();
00185         tex->setHgeTextureSize((uint)size);
00186 
00187         return tex;
00188     }
00189 
00190     /*************************************************************************
00191     Destroy a texture
00192     *************************************************************************/
00193     void HgeRenderer::destroyTexture(Texture* texture)
00194     {
00195         if (texture != NULL)
00196         {
00197             HgeTexture* tex = (HgeTexture*)texture;
00198             m_texturelist.remove(tex);
00199             delete tex;
00200         }
00201 
00202     }
00203 
00204     // destroy all textures still active
00205     void HgeRenderer::destroyAllTextures(void)
00206     {
00207         while (!m_texturelist.empty())
00208         {
00209             destroyTexture(*(m_texturelist.begin()));
00210         }
00211     }

00213     /*************************************************************************
00214     render a quad directly to the display
00215     *************************************************************************/
00216     void HgeRenderer::renderQuadDirect(const Rect& dest_rect, float z, const Texture* tex, const Rect& texture_rect, const ColourRect& colours)
00217     {
00218         // create it
00219         static hgeQuad _quad;
00220 
00221         // set it up
00222         // the posittion and size
00223         _quad.v[0].x        = dest_rect.d_left;
00224         _quad.v[0].y        = dest_rect.d_top;
00225 
00226         _quad.v[1].x        = dest_rect.d_right;
00227         _quad.v[1].y        = dest_rect.d_top;
00228 
00229         _quad.v[2].x        = dest_rect.d_right;
00230         _quad.v[2].y        = dest_rect.d_bottom;
00231 
00232         _quad.v[3].x        = dest_rect.d_left;
00233         _quad.v[3].y        = dest_rect.d_bottom;
00234 
00235         // the z-buffer
00236         _quad.v[0].z      = 0;
00237         _quad.v[1].z      = 0;
00238         _quad.v[2].z      = 0;
00239         _quad.v[3].z      = 0;
00240 
00241         // texture
00242         _quad.tex           = ((HgeTexture*)tex)->getHgeTexture();
00243 
00244         // the texture coords
00245         _quad.v[0].tx       = texture_rect.d_left;
00246         _quad.v[0].ty       = texture_rect.d_top;
00247 
00248         _quad.v[1].tx       = texture_rect.d_right;
00249         _quad.v[1].ty       = texture_rect.d_top;
00250 
00251         _quad.v[2].tx       = texture_rect.d_right;
00252         _quad.v[2].ty       = texture_rect.d_bottom;
00253 
00254         _quad.v[3].tx       = texture_rect.d_left;
00255         _quad.v[3].ty       = texture_rect.d_bottom;
00256 
00257         // the vertex colors
00258         _quad.v[0].col      = colours.d_top_left.getARGB();
00259         _quad.v[1].col      = colours.d_top_right.getARGB();
00260         _quad.v[2].col       = colours.d_bottom_right.getARGB();
00261         _quad.v[3].col       = colours.d_bottom_left.getARGB();
00262 
00263         // blending
00264         _quad.blend = BLEND_DEFAULT_Z;
00265 
00266         // render it
00267         hge->Gfx_RenderQuad(&_quad);
00268     }
00269 
00270     bool HgeRenderer::setSorter::operator()(const hgeQuad* a, const hgeQuad* b) const
00271     {
00272         return a->v[0].z > b->v[0].z;
00273     }
